label: getempleadosPuestos

def getempleadosPuestos():
    query = """
            select 
            e.name as "Empleado",
            s.name as "Supervisor",
            a.area as "Área",
            p.puesto as "Puesto"
            from empleados e
            left join empleados s on e.supervisor_id=s.id
            inner join areas a on e.area_id=a.id

    query = """
            select 
            p.puesto as "Puesto", 
            a.area as "Área", 
            a.descripcion as "Descripción" 
            from puestos p 
            inner join 
            areas a on p.id_area=a.id            
            where p.deleted_at is null

            select 
            m.codigo as "Código",
            m.nombre as "Nombre",

registros_timesheetMes_dona
peekOfCode:
def registros_timesheetMes_dona():
    query = """
        select
            sum(case when t.estatus = 'aprobado' then 1 else 0 end) as "Aprobado",
            sum(case when t.estatus = 'rechazado' then 1 else 0 end) as "Rechazado",
            sum(case when t.estatus = 'pendiente' then 1 else 0 end) as "Pendiente",
            sum(case when t.estatus = 'borrador' then 1 else 0 end) as "Borrador",
            count(*) as "Registros Totales"
        from timesheet t
        where t.estatus IN ('aprobado', 'rechazado')
